document_data.caption: The ruins of Hawksroost and the region to its east, ''circa'' [[1480 DR]]
document_data.name: Hawksroost
document_data.mainbody: '''Hawksroost''' was a [[village]] found in the [[Moonsea North]] region of [[North Faer√ªn]],{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|56}}{{Cite dungeon/177/Realmslore: Vaasa|81}} ''circa'' the late 13{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Geography: The village lay  on the border of [[Thar]] southeast of [[the Ride]], less than {{SI|50|mi|k}} south of [[Ilinvur]]. Before it was left to ruin, it was fairly accessible by the nearby [[Ilinvur Trail]] and [[Naed Creek]].
document_data.History: Sometime after the {{yearlinkName|1299}}, Hawksroost was destroyed in a series of [[ogre]] attacks.
document_data.Inhabitants: Hawksroost was once the home of [[Daern]], a warrior who fought alongside the [[Ilmatari]] priest [[Flaergon]] of [[Glister]] and figured highly in the tale of the ''[[Tome of Torment]]''.
